comments:
There is no Motif support for 64 bit Linux.  We have an RCP application that uses the AWT_SWT bridge.  After building the application we get the follow error when running:

popup dialog says:
An error has occurred. See the log file
/netap/udu_units/towersj_linux/out/java/rac/bin/workspace/.metadata/.log.

There seem to be two problems reported here:
1) No support for Motif 64 bit and 
2) A "Widget disposed too early!" when running on GTK 64.  
These problems need to be tracked separately.  

Changing the title to track the second problem.  Please enter an enhancement request for the 64 bit Motif support.
*** Bug 135747 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
